definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_has_item_inventory"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Refinedoil</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">SPEED</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">60</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">24000</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Refinedoil</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">SLOWNESS</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">60</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
